creator: Nium Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Sending money around the world just got a whole lot easier and more cost-effective with our InstaReM app.

InstaReM uses Zero-margin FX rates rates to provide expats, businesses and foreign students with a fast, convenient and cost-effective way to transfer money online. The InstaReM app helps you send money anywhere across the globe at a very low cost as compared to traditional money transfer methods. We have been ranked No. 1 cost-effective remittance platform in various payment corridors by the World Bank. With our Zero-margin FX rates, Low Transfer Fees and No Hidden Charges, we make sending and receiving money from overseas a breeze.

Transfer Money Overseas In 3 Simple Steps With InstaReM:

1. Register
2. Add Payee
3. Set Up A Transfer

APP FEATURES

- Send money on-the-go 24/7, to more than 50 countries across the world
- Smooth sign up and easy log in
- Get Zero-Margin FX rates
- Low Transfer Fees
- No Hidden Charges
- Multiple payment options: InstaReM supports PoLi (in Australia only) and bank transfers
- Track your transfers on the go
- Typically same day or next business day international money transfers
- View your transaction history, update your payee list and payment methods
- Enhanced security and information protection

SPECIAL OFFERINGS

- Exclusive promotions and discounts
- First Transfer Bonus
- Referral Bonus
- Prompt & Proactive Client Services

Client Services available via chat, phone and emails. For any queries, kindly visit www.instarem.com or write to us at support@instarem.com

Send Money Overseas From Australia (AUD)
Transfer AUD to EUR, AUD to RMB, AUD to INR, AUD to GBP, AUD to VND, AUD to PHP, AUD to USD, AUD to BDT, AUD to LKR and AUD to other world currencies at Zero-margin FX rates.

Remit From Singapore (SGD)
Send SGD to RMB, SGD to MYR, SGD to INR, SGD to EUR, SGD to IDR, AUD to USD, AUD to GBP and SGD to other world currencies at Zero-margin exchange rates.

Transfer Money From Hong Kong (HKD)
Transfer HKD to RMB, HKD to USD, HKD to EUR, HKD to GBP, HKD to IDR, HKD to PHP, HKD to INR and other HKD to world currencies at Zero-margin exchange rates.

Say goodbye to the hassles of wire transfer and international bank transfer and switch over to a new intelligent way to send money around the world.

Countries we serve in Asia
You can send money to India (INR), Bangladesh (BDT), Hong Kong (HKD), Indonesia (IDR), Nepal (NPR), Philippines (PHP), Singapore (SGD) and Sri Lanka (LKR)

Countries we serve in Europe
You can send money to UK (GBP), Austria (Euro), Belgium (Euro), Estonia (Euro), Finland (Euro), France (Euro), Germany (Euro), Greece (Euro), Ireland (Euro), Italy (Euro), Luxembourg (Euro), Malta (Euro), Netherlands (Euro), Portugal (Euro) and Spain (Euro)

Countries we serve in North America
USA (USD), Canada (CAD)
Countries we serve in Oceania
Australia (AUD)

Please Note: You can currently transfer money to the above countries from Australia, Singapore and Hong Kong.

Regulating Authorities
We are a regulated business and licensed by the Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC License No: 464627), Hong Kong Customs and Excise Department (HK License No: 16-01-01797) and Monetary Authority of Singapore (RA No: 01582)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have a shiny new app. Don’t worry all the familiar functionalities have stayed intact. In fact, we have added some new cool features to accompany our new look!
Our new Message centre will keep you updated with exciting new features & promotions instore for you
We have added a Quick Send functionality that allows you to send money to your ‘favourite’ beneficiaries in just two clicks
We have added a Dark Mode theme especially for you. You can always switch the light back on.

title: InstaReM – Send Money Overseas

creator: Nium Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Sending money around the world just got a whole lot simpler with your Instarem app.  

We provide a fast, convenient, and cost-effective way to transfer money across the globe compared to traditional money transfer methods. With our great FX rates, low fees and no hidden charges, we make sending and receiving money from overseas a breeze. 

Get started in 3 simple steps:
• Register
• Add payee
• Set up a transfer 

APP FEATURES

- Send money on-the-go 24/7, to 55+ countries across the world
- Easy sign up and log in
- Great FX rates
- Low Transfer Fees
- No Hidden Charges
- Multiple payment and pay-out options including card, bank, and cash.
- Track your transfers on the go
- Typically same day or next business day international money transfers
- View your transaction history, update your payee list and payment methods
- Enhanced security and information protection

SPECIAL OFFERINGS

- Exclusive promotions and discounts
- First Transfer Bonus
- Referral Bonus
- Prompt & friendly Customer Service teams

Our Customer service is available via live chat and emails. For any queries, kindly visit www.instarem.com and chat to Adam, or write to us at support@instarem.com 

Regulating Authorities

We’re regulated by leading financial regulators across the globe. You can be sure we do everything by the book!

- Australia: NIUM PTY Limited (formerly known as Instarem PTY Ltd) is regulated in Australia by ASIC (AFS License No. 464627)
- Canada: NIUM Canada Corporation (formerly known as Instarem Canada Corporation) (License No. M15669293) is regulated by the Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada 
- Hong Kong: NIUM LIMITED (formerly known as Instarem LIMITED) (License No. 16/01/01797) is regulated by the Hong Kong Customs and Excise Department
 - India: NIUM India Pvt. Ltd. (formerly known as Instarem India Pvt. Ltd.) operates in association with SBM Bank and is regulated by the Reserve Bank of India, vide its approval letter Number. SBM/Mum/RP/009
​ - Indonesia: PT Instarem Mitra Indonesia (License No. 21/261/Jkt/1) is regulated by Bank Indonesia.
 - Japan: Nium Japan Kabushiki Kaisha (formerly known as Instarem Japan Kabushiki Kaisha) (registration no: Kanto Local Finance Bureau no. 00073) is a Funds Transfer Services Provider registered with the Prime Minister under the Payment Services Act (Act No. 59 of June 24, 2009). 
- Lithuania: UAB NIUM EU (formerly known as UAB Instarem EU) (License No. 14) is regulated by Lietuvos Bankas (Bank of Lithuania)​ -Malaysia: NIUM SDN. BHD. (formerly known as Instarem Malaysia Sdn. Bhd.) Registration No. 201701000367 (1214517-X) is regulated in Malaysia by Central Bank of Malaysia under MY License Serial Number 00222.​ 
- Singapore: NIUM Pte. Ltd. (formerly known as Instarem Pte. Limited) is regulated by the Monetary Authority of Singapore as a major payment institution under License No. PS20200276.
​ - United States of America: NIUM, Inc. (formerly known as Instarem USA Corporation), operates in the United States under a program sponsored by Community Federal Savings Bank, to which NIUM is a service provider (NMLS ID No. 1528562). 
- UK: NIUM FINTECH LIMITED (formerly known as Instarem Limited), Reference number 901024, is regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority as an Authorised Electronic Money Institution (EMI) provider and is licensed to issue electronic money (e-money) and provide payment services.
descriptionShort: Simplifying money and payments. Fast, secure, and cost-effective transfers

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• We have refreshed our look and logo, for all geographies.
• Singapore is getting an upgraded app. Don’t worry, we will be rolling it out to all regions in no time!

This includes:
- Better navigation, so you get things done faster, with minimal clicks.
- Message centre for latest news and promos.
- Quick Send functionality to send money faster, to your ‘favourite’ beneficiaries.
- Quick access to your recent transfers– they are now right there on your dashboard.
- Dark Mode theme

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Better, Faster, and Neater with 3.4.0. 

What’s new: 
• Real-time transactions with Credit/Debit Card. 
• Added Kenyan Bank Transfer as a pay-out option. 
• Enabled blocking Amaze Card from the app. 
• Enabled Ranting to our Product Teams via our surveys. 

App highlights: 
• Instant Transfers? Yes, now enabled via Credit/Debit Cards. 
• We removed the restriction on “/” so you can seamlessly register as “S/O Superman or D/O Batman” on Amaze.

• Trouble logging-in? Do check out our Customer support options for quick troubleshooting.

title: Instarem: Send money overseas

creator: Nium Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Send money overseas simply with Instarem. We’re here to make your life a little bit easier with simple, fast, and safe money transfer methods - offering a great exchange rate and rewards too!

Who is Instarem for?

Whether you want to send money overseas to family and friends, or are a small businesses making cross-border payments — we’ve got your back!

Easy & fast transfer, better FX rates

• With Instarem, money transfer to 55+ countries overseas.
• Usually instant or next-day transfers & transactions.
• Competitive exchange rate and low costs, with no hidden fees or payments.
• Avoid costs incurred by traditional wire & bank methods.
• Currency converter to check the exchange rate before you remit.
• Exchange rate alerts so you never miss a good one again.
• Multiple payments and pay out options.
• Rewards on every transfer.

Transfer money & earn rewards - you deserve it!

We offer plenty of ways to get rewards. We call them InstaPoints, you can call them money savers!

• Score discounts every time you send money and pay - the more you pay, the more rewards you can earn.
• Earn points for opening an account with us - it’s our way of saying hello.
• Earn points for referring a friend to us - it’s our way of saying thanks.

Check any exchange rate with our currency converter

Our in-app currency converter allows you to check the exchange rate in every country. Simply input the amount you want to send into the currency converter, and select where to - we'll show you exactly what you will pay. It's more cost-effective than traditional bank & wire methods.

Your money is safe with us

We are licensed by the Australian Securities and Investment Commission, and registered with the Australian Transaction Reports and Analysis Centre as an independent remittance dealer. Whether you’re sending money back home or making international transactions, we’ve got everything covered so that the process to remit money, make payments, or receive funds by your recipients, is fast, simple, and most importantly - safe!

You can't see it, but we are blushing

We’ll just leave this here:
Best Value International Money Transfer Provider Award (Mozo Experts Choice, Australia 2020), Excellence in Payments (Fintech Australia, 2018), Blockchain Innovator Award (Swell by Ripple, 2019, San Francisco) and more.

Let's connect

Why not join the customers and businesses that trust us to transfer money globally? Download the app or go to our site to chat to us 24/7, we’re just a few taps away!

Visit us here for our complete terms and policies
https://www.instarem.com/info/all-policies
descriptionShort: Send money overseas & pay in any currency - get great exchange rate & rewards

title: Instarem: Money transfer app

creator: Nium Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Send money overseas simply with award-winning money sending app, Instarem.

We're here to make your life a little bit easier. We’re all about quick and easy money transfer methods overseas - making it simple, fast, and with rewards too!

Instarem - Who is our money sending app for?

Whether you want to send money international to family and friends, or are a small business making a cross-border payment — we’ve got your back!

Easy money transfer, better exchange rate

• With Instarem, send money international to 55+ countries.
• Fast money transfer & transactions - no more than 2 business days.
• Competitive overseas exchange rate and low costs.
• No hidden fees or payments - avoid unfair costs incurred by a traditional wire transfer.
• Currency converter to check the exchange rate before you remit.
• Rate alerts so you never miss a good exchange rate again.
• Multiple pay-out and payments options on transfers and transactions.
• Earn rewards on every money transfer.

Remit money, get rewarded - you deserve it!

We offer plenty of ways to get rewards when you send money international. We call them InstaPoints, you can call them money savers!

• Score discounts on every money transfer and all transactions - essentially, the more you remit, the more rewards points you earn.
• Earn points for opening an account with us - it’s our way of saying hello.
• Earn points for referring a friend to us - it’s our way of saying thanks.

Use our currency converter for total control

Our in-app currency converter allows you to check & convert the exchange rate in every country. Simply input the amount you want to send into the currency converter, and select where to - we'll show you how much you’ll pay, and what your recipient will receive. Without hidden fees and payments, it’s typically more cost-effective than a traditional wire transfer.

Send money international - your money is safe with us

We operate under a program sponsored by Community Federal Savings Bank, to which Nium is a service provider. Whether you’re sending money back home or making international transactions, we’ve got everything covered so that the process to remit money, make a payment, or receive funds by your recipients, is fast, simple, and most importantly - safe!

You can't see it, but we are blushing

Our money sending app has won some awards - we’ll just leave this here:
Best Value International Money Transfer Provider Award (Mozo Experts Choice, Australia 2020), Excellence in Payments (Fintech Australia, 2018), Blockchain Innovator Award (Swell by Ripple, 2019, San Francisco) and more.

Let's connect

Download our money sending app today, or go to our site to chat to us 24/7!

Visit us here for our complete terms and policies
https://www.instarem.com/info/all-policies

• Earn points for opening an account with us - it’s our way of saying hello.
• Earn points for referring a friend to us - it’s our way of saying thanks.

Check any exchange rate with our currency converter

Our in-app currency converter allows you to check the exchange rate in every country. Simply input the amount you want to send into the currency converter, and select where to - we'll show you exactly what you will pay. It's more cost-effective than traditional bank & wire methods.

Your money is safe with us

We are licensed by the Australian Securities and Investment Commission, and registered with the Australian Transaction Reports and Analysis Centre as an independent remittance dealer. Whether you’re sending money back home or making international transactions, we’ve got everything covered so that the process to remit money, make payments, or receive funds by your recipients, is fast, simple, and most importantly - safe!

You can't see it, but we are blushing

We’ll just leave this here:
Best Value International Money Transfer Provider Award (Mozo Experts Choice, Australia 2020), Excellence in Payments (Fintech Australia, 2018), Blockchain Innovator Award (Swell by Ripple, 2019, San Francisco) and more.

Let's connect

Why not join the customers and businesses that trust us to transfer money globally? Download the app or go to our site to chat to us 24/7, we’re just a few taps away!

Visit us here for our complete terms and policies

• Multiple payments and pay out options.
• Rewards on every transfer.

🎁Transfer money & earn rewards - you deserve it!

We offer plenty of ways to get rewards. We call them InstaPoints, you can call them money savers!

✔ Score discounts every time you send money and pay - the more you pay, the more rewards you can earn.
✔ Earn points for opening an account with us - it’s our way of saying hello.
✔ Earn points for referring a friend to us - it’s our way of saying thanks.

💱Check any exchange rate with our currency converter

Our in-app currency converter allows you to check the exchange rate in every country. Simply input the amount you want to send into the currency converter, and select where to - we'll show you exactly what you will pay. It's more cost-effective than traditional bank & wire methods.

🔒Your money is safe with us

We are licensed by the Australian Securities and Investment Commission, and registered with the Australian Transaction Reports and Analysis Centre as an independent remittance dealer. Whether you’re sending money back home or making international transactions, we’ve got everything covered so that the process to remit money, make payments, or receive funds by your recipients, is fast, simple, and most importantly - safe!

🏆You can't see it, but we are blushing

We’ll just leave this here:
Best Value International Money Transfer Provider Award (Mozo Experts Choice, Australia 2020), Excellence in Payments (Fintech Australia, 2018), Blockchain Innovator Award (Swell by Ripple, 2019, San Francisco) and more.

📌Let's connect

Why not join the customers and businesses that trust us to transfer money globally? Download the app or go to our site to chat to us 24/7, we’re just a few taps away!

Visit us here for our complete terms and policies

title: Instarem: Send Money Overseas

creator: Nium Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
💸 Send money abroad easily at great exchange rates | Fast & secure money transfer
Over 1 million customers joined Instarem since 2014 for fast and simple international money transfers.

We’re a part of the fintech unicorn, Nium, and we simplify the way you send money overseas.
🌎✨ You can use our app to transfer money to 60+ countries with excellent foreign exchange rate and low fees, track your money transfer, and earn rewards. Now that’s what we call Money Simple.

Whether you need to support your family back home or are a small business looking to pay your vendors overseas, we’ve got you covered. Instarem is truly one of the best money transfer app.

What sets us apart from other digital money transfer services is our technology – it’s smarter, faster, and more reliable. Just a few taps on your mobile phone and you can send money wherever it needs to be. That’s not all, with our competitive currency conversion rates, low fees and rewards, you can be sure to get the best value for money.

🚀Download our fast and secure remittance app and enjoy its benefits:

➢ Send money internationally on the go.
➢ Usually instant money transfer or same-day money transfer.
➢ Safe and secure app licensed and regulated in 11 countries.
➢ Bank-beating foreign exchange rate and minimal fees.
➢ Special offer on your first money transfer.
➢ No unfair hidden charges incurred as with most banks.
➢ No fees to receive money.
➢ Multiple pay-out and payments options for international money transfer.
➢ Transfer tracking for complete peace of mind.

💰 Brace yourself for big savings:

➢ Use our currency converter

Become a master of currency conversion! With our in-app currency converter, you can check FX rates for your chosen currencies.

➢ Set up free rate alerts

Make informed decisions before remitting money. Set up notifications for your desired currency conversion rate.

➢ Earn rewards using our app

Our money sending app offers plenty of ways to earn loyalty points called InstaPoints. Earn points when you open an account, send money and refer a friend – and use the points to score discounts on your remittance.

🔒 Your money is safe with us

We operate under a program sponsored by Community Federal Savings Bank, to which Nium is a service provider. Whether you’re sending money online to friends and family or making international business payments, we’ve got everything covered so that the remittance process is simple, transparent, and most importantly – safe.

🏆 Bragging rights: some awards we’ve won

Our happy customers will tell you that Instarem is one of the best money transfer app. And though our customers’ satisfaction is the best award, we’ve been lauded with these too:

➢ Best Value International Money Transfer Provider Award (Mozo Experts Choice, Australia 2021 and 2020)
➢ Blockchain Innovator Award (Swell by Ripple, 2019, San Francisco)
➢ Excellence in Payments (Fintech Australia, 2018)
…and more.

🙌 Sign up in 3 simple steps:

1. Instarem app download - get the app for free.
2. Create an account using your Google, Facebook or email ID. You can also set up fingerprint or Face ID login.
3. Verify your details. All done!

📌 Let's connect

Download our money transfer app today and unlock a world of simple, low-cost personal and business payments.

If there’s anything you need, send us an enquiry or chat with us 24/7 via Help centre on our app or website: www.instarem.com

View our terms and policies here: www.instarem.com/terms-policies

Say hello to us on social media:

Facebook: www.facebook.com/GetInstarem/
Instagram: www.instagram.com/instarem/
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/instarem/
Twitter: www.twitter.com/getinstarem/

Whether you need to support your family back home or are a small business looking to pay your vendors overseas, we’ve got you covered. Instarem is truly one of the best money transfer app.

What sets us apart from other digital money transfer services is our technology – it’s smarter, faster, and more reliable. Just a few taps on your mobile phone and you can send money wherever it needs to be. That’s not all, with our competitive currency conversion rates, low fees and rewards, you can be sure to get the best value for money.

🚀Download our fast and secure remittance app and enjoy its benefits:

➢ Send money internationally on the go.
➢ Usually instant money transfer or same-day money transfer.
➢ Safe and secure app licensed and regulated in 11 countries.

➢ Special offer on your first money transfer.
➢ No unfair hidden charges incurred as with most banks.
➢ No fees to receive money.
➢ Multiple pay-out and payments options for international money transfer.
➢ Transfer tracking for complete peace of mind.

title:
Instarem: Send Money Overseas
3.15.3

creator: Nium Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
💸 Send money abroad easily at great exchange rates | Fast & secure money transfer
Over 1 million customers joined Instarem since 2014 for fast and simple international money transfers.

We’re a part of the fintech unicorn, Nium, and we simplify the way you send money overseas.
🌎✨ You can use our app to transfer money to 60+ countries with excellent foreign exchange rate and low fees, track your money transfer, and earn rewards. Now that’s what we call Money Simple.

Whether you need to support your family back home or are a small business looking to pay your vendors overseas, we’ve got you covered. Instarem is truly one of the best money transfer app.

What sets us apart from other digital money transfer services is our technology – it’s smarter, faster, and more reliable. Just a few taps on your mobile phone and you can send money wherever it needs to be. That’s not all, with our competitive currency conversion rates, low fees and rewards, you can be sure to get the best value for money.

🚀Download our fast and secure remittance app and enjoy its benefits:

➢ Send money internationally on the go.
➢ Usually instant money transfer or same-day money transfer.
➢ Safe and secure app licensed and regulated in 11 countries.
➢ Bank-beating foreign exchange rate and minimal fees.
➢ Special offer on your first money transfer.
➢ No unfair hidden charges incurred as with most banks.
➢ No fees to receive money.
➢ Multiple pay-out and payments options for international money transfer.
➢ Transfer tracking for complete peace of mind.

💰 Brace yourself for big savings:

➢ Use our currency converter

Become a master of currency conversion! With our in-app currency converter, you can check FX rates for your chosen currencies.

➢ Set up free rate alerts

Make informed decisions before remitting money. Set up notifications for your desired currency conversion rate.

➢ Earn rewards using our app

Our money sending app offers plenty of ways to earn loyalty points called InstaPoints. Earn points when you open an account, send money and refer a friend – and use the points to score discounts on your remittance.

🔒 Your money is safe with us

We operate under a program sponsored by Community Federal Savings Bank, to which Nium is a service provider. Whether you’re sending money online to friends and family or making international business payments, we’ve got everything covered so that the remittance process is simple, transparent, and most importantly – safe.

🏆 Bragging rights: some awards we’ve won

Our happy customers will tell you that Instarem is one of the best money transfer app. And though our customers’ satisfaction is the best award, we’ve been lauded with these too:

➢ Best Value International Money Transfer Provider Award (Mozo Experts Choice, Australia 2021 and 2020)
➢ Blockchain Innovator Award (Swell by Ripple, 2019, San Francisco)
➢ Excellence in Payments (Fintech Australia, 2018)
…and more.

🙌 Sign up in 3 simple steps:

1. Instarem app download - get the app for free.
2. Create an account using your Google, Facebook or email ID. You can also set up fingerprint or Face ID login.
3. Verify your details. All done!

📌 Let's connect

Download our money transfer app today and unlock a world of simple, low-cost personal and business payments.

If there’s anything you need, send us an enquiry or chat with us 24/7 via Help centre on our app or website: www.instarem.com

View our terms and policies here: www.instarem.com/terms-policies

Say hello to us on social media:

Facebook: www.facebook.com/GetInstarem/
Instagram: www.instagram.com/instarem/
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/instarem/
Twitter: www.twitter.com/getinstarem/
descriptionShort: Send money overseas & pay in any currency - get great exchange rate & rewards

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. New InstaPoints redemption options [SG]. Redeeming your InstaPoints just got more exciting! Explore new ways to use your points and get more out of every transaction.
2. Withdraw funds from your wallet [SG]. You asked, we listened! You can now transfer funds from your amaze wallet directly into your bank account, giving you more control and flexibility.

Update now to enjoy these new features and improvements! 🚀

title:
Instarem: Send Money Overseas
3.15.7

creator: Nium Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Join over 1 million customers who trust Instarem for fast, secure, and low-cost international money transfers. Founded in 2014 and part of fintech unicorn Nium, Instarem makes sending money overseas simple, affordable, and reliable.

Whether you're supporting your family, paying international vendors, or sending money back home, Instarem is the best app for international money transfers. With competitive foreign exchange rates, low fees, and instant remittance, your cross-border payments are always in good hands.

💰Try us with a special first-time offer

Enjoy an exclusive welcome offer on your first money transfer—whether it’s zero fees, better rates, or both. Sign up to see what’s waiting for you.

🌎✨ Why choose Instarem?

➢ Fast & secure money transfers
Send money globally in minutes, with bank-grade security and real-time tracking.

➢ Low-cost remittance
Get better-than-bank foreign exchange rates and low, transparent fees—no hidden charges.

➢ Trusted global remittance app
Licensed and regulated in 11 jurisdictions for safe, reliable remittance.

Top features of the Instarem money transfer app:

➢Send money internationally to over 60 countries
➢Currency conversion rates with real-time FX rate checker
➢Rate alerts to track your preferred exchange rate
➢Rewards program that gives you rewards on every transfer, referral, and sign-up—redeemable for discounts or air miles

🔒 Safe & transparent remittance
➢ Regulated in 11 jurisdictions
➢ No hidden fees—just clear, upfront pricing unlike banks or traditional remittance services

Send from:
SGD, USD, AUD, EUR, MYR, JPY, HKD, GBP, CAD, INR

Send to:
INR, PHP, GHS, CNY, AUD, KES, GBP, LKR, THB, EUR, DOP, VND, COP, CAD, CLP, NGN, USD, PKR, ARS, KRW, MXN, NPR, NZD, PEN, BDT, BRL, GTQ, HKD, MYR, IDR, UYU, UGX, TRY, SGD and more

🧳 Flexible ways to pay and receive money

Choose from a wide range of payment and payout options tailored to your convenience.

➢ Payment methods: Bank Transfer, ACH/Direct Debit, Credit Card, Debit Card, FPX Transfer, INTERAC e-Transfer, Linked bank account, PayID Transfer, PayNow, Wire Transfer

➢ Payout methods:
Bank Deposit, Cash pickup, Bank Card, DuitNow, Pix, UPI, Debit Card, Alipay Wallet, E-Wallet.

Note-methods vary by country.

🏆Award-winning service

➢ Best Value International Money Transfer Provider – Mozo Experts Choice (Australia, 2021 & 2020)
➢ Blockchain Innovator Award – Swell by Ripple (2019)
➢ Excellence in Payments – Fintech Australia (2018)

🙌 Get started in 3 easy steps:

1. Download the Instarem app – it’s free
2. Sign up with your email or Google account
3. Verify your details and start sending money abroad

📌 Need help?

Chat with us 24/7 via the Help Center in the app or visit www.instarem.com

Stay connected:
Facebook: www.facebook.com/GetInstarem/
Instagram: www.instagram.com/instarem/
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/instarem/
Twitter: www.twitter.com/getinstarem/
